New Records: Elly De La Cruz joined Hall of Famer Joe Morgan and Eric Davis as the only players in franchise history to hit 25 home runs and steal 65 bases in the same season.
Key Match Events: Elly De La Cruz hit a three-run home run in the bottom of the fourth inning against Jared Jones, a 426-foot blast to right field above the visitor bullpen.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Winter Weather Advisory in effect for Friday. Expect a solid 2-4" with impacts for the evening commute.
Others: Elly De La Cruz's latest homer against the Pittsburgh Pirates on September 21, 2024.
